title: Chocolate cupcakes
ingredients: ['For the cupcakes', '60g good quality (70%) cocoa powder', '4 or 5 tablespoons boiling hot water', '175g unsalted butter, softened', '175g caster sugar', '120g self-raising flour', '1 level teaspoon baking powder', '3 eggs', 'For the buttercream icing', '100g dark chocolate, melted', '60g butter, softened', '250g icing sugar', 'Chocolate sprinkles, for decorating']
